about_the_game:
Indoras: The Whispering Shards

Enter a world of fantasy and adventure, dungeon-based game set in a realm on the brink of collapse. Once proud protectors of the land, the Templars have fallen under a sinister influence and now siphons the world’s elemental power for their own ambitions. Play one of five distinct classes—Warrior, Guardian, Heretic, Elementalist, or Sorcerer— and battle through seven different zones, each shaped by a corrupted Templar’s domain.

Key Features

  • Group based or Single player dungeon-based runs

    • Embark in dungeon runs on your own or either with your friends, up to 4 players

    • Progress in playing dungeons on various difficulties, and clearing them out faster for better loot

    • Learn the story of Indoras by progressing through dungeons, various dungeons per zone that unveils the story and the Templar's connection to it.

  • Customized Characters

    • Ability to choose different looks for your character to reflect your own identity.|

  • Simplified Abilities System

    • Tier based abilities system where you can pick 5 abilities at a time, one ability from each tier, different abilities allow improvement in different roles and gives you the ability to build hybrid roles!

    • One shared tier between all classes that provides an ability that assists you in improving your role abilities

  • Simplicity of Stats and Item Crafting, and Gearing

    • Stats are simple! Attack Power, Amor, Stamina, and Dexterity, all classes use the same stats while depending on your class you get different attribute variations.

    • All Items are crafted! Dungeon loots are shared crafting materials that you use to craft the missing pieces of your gear. 

  • No Traditional Leveling Grind or Gear Grind

    • Rather than a typical leveling system, all abilities are available on start, where it gives you the ability to craft your playstyle not tied to a class, but tied to how you would like to experience this class

    • Shared Inventory: All characters can use the same inventory and items, where different item sets will let you specialize more into a role you'd love to play

  • Five Unique Classes

    • Warrior: Aggressive frontline brawler who excels at threat generation and burst defense.

    • Guardian: Defensive bulwark focused on area denial, team protection, and sturdy positioning.

    • Heretic: A cunning blend of melee and ranged attacks, leveraging forbidden powers to debuff enemies and aid allies with dark auras.

    • Elementalist: Wields raw elemental forces (e.g., fire, ice, earth, wind) for devastating area control and environmental manipulation.

    • Sorcerer: Arcane spellcaster specializing in refined magic—illusions, single-target unravels, and precise spell combos.

  • Role Focused Play

    • Choose the role you'd love to enjoy, either as Defensive, Offensive, or Supportive, or you can be Hybrid! 

      • Defensive: Focus on being the main point of enemy attack focus, having abilities that improves survivability.

      • Offensive: The main damage dealer in game, the role plays mainly around damage

      • Supportive: While still doing damage, assist your allies in improving their abilities, such as increased armor and damage

      • Hybrid: Mix and match your abilities that allows you to play a hybrid role

short_description: Conquer dungeons with synergy-based classes, and flexible/hybrid roles. Run through zones to reclaim the land that was once preserved by the protectors of the realm. Tactical dungeon based RPG that can be played alone or with friends up to 4 players!
